JGAL

Class GAL_ClassicRankingSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • JGAL.GAL_NaturalSelector
      • JGAL.GAL_RankingSelector
        • JGAL.GAL_ClassicRankingSelector

  • public class GAL_ClassicRankingSelector
extends GAL_RankingSelector
    The GAL_ClassicRankingSelector extends from GAL_RankingSelector and is one of the Selection Operators implemented by default.

    Is the Original Ranking selector. It is based on the expected number of offspring for the best chromosome of the population.
